speaker: Topaz
line: ...Old Oti is a tricky opponent. I didn't expect him to take the risky step of "going public" at such a critical moment for Penacony.

speaker: Jade
line: Indeed, he's definitely bold. It's that kind of boldness that made him the Oti Alfalfa he is today.

speaker: Jade
line: Still, the outcome is uncertain. Shouting loud doesn't necessarily carry any weight. What about the phone call I asked you to make, Topaz?

speaker: Topaz
line: Ah, they agreed, but it'll be some time before they arrive.

speaker: Jade
line: Just as it should be. The "sweet dew" should be served after the "bitter poison".

speaker: Topaz
line: Looks like we'll be skipping the "exchanging apples" step this time around.

speaker: Jade
line: Now that we're dealing with a greedy merchant, a simple apple wouldn't make a difference. Well, I guess I included myself in that remark too.

speaker: Jade
line: Now I'm a bit curious, Topaz. Do you think Penacony is a quality asset?

speaker: Topaz
line: Yes, despite its recent calamity, Penacony remains a top-quality asset within the Cosmos, with good credit, lucrative potential, and promising prospects.

speaker: Jade
line: Well, that's obvious, but what I truly wanted to know is: This project is obviously too bland for your taste, isn't it?

speaker: Topaz
line: That's true. I wouldn't be here if it weren't for Aventurine .

speaker: Jade
line: But despite that, you trust him. You even entrusted him with a Cornerstone , something as precious as life itself, to finish this gamble.

speaker: Topaz
line: Are you not in the same boat, Miss Jade? Without us playing along, your "Jade Stone" wouldn't have made it across the border so easily, allowing you to see all desires that flow through dreams to gain a bargaining chip in negotiations...

speaker: Topaz
line: That's why I'm willing to stake my "Topaz Stone" to cover for you... It's like one big elaborate game of chess.

speaker: Jade
line: Once that kid sets his mind to something, nothing can stop him, not even fate. Well, at least he's still alive, and that's the best outcome.

speaker: Topaz
line: Looks like... we've strayed off-topic, Miss Jade. Should we discuss our next steps?

speaker: Jade
line: No need. I'll go it alone. Meanwhile, you can go greet our honored guest and wait for my message.

speaker: Topaz
line: Okay.

title: Step Description
content: The meeting with Oti Alfalfa surprised Topaz and Jade. They didn't expect him to be preparing for the public listing of Penacony Conglomerate.They have to go straight for Old Oti's sore spots during the second half of negotiations to guarantee theIPC's entry into Penacony goes off without a hitch.Jade discovers Robin has also boardedthe Radiant Feldspar, and plans to go up and greet this cosmic superstar.

speaker: Jade
line: (Is that... Robin? She's also here, on the Radiant Feldspar.)

speaker: Jade
line: Greetings, Miss Robin. I didn't expect to meet you here.

speaker: Robin
line: Miss Jade? Greetings. The opening ceremony for the Charmony Festival has been moved to the Radiant Feldspar, so I'm here making some preparations.

speaker: Robin
line: How about you? Have you spoken with Mr. Alfalfa?

speaker: Jade
line: I'm actually on my way to meet him right now. Do you know him well, Miss Robin?

speaker: Robin
line: Unfortunately, I've never met him. I've only heard a few comments from the former head of the Oak Family ... Mr. Alfalfa is respectable when it comes to business, but in other respects... I can't say the same.

speaker: Jade
line: Where do you think the future of the Planet of Festivities is headed?

speaker: Robin
line: I believe the sweet dream will see its rebirth, just like the Radiant Feldspar resumed its voyage.

speaker: Robin
line: The Harmony needs a new direction. Only by bidding farewell to the past can we actually sail into the future.

speaker: Robin
line: There are no permanent allies or everlasting enemies. So, let's both... take what we need from this deal.

speaker: Jade
line: Naturally. I'm looking forward to your performance. See you at the Festival.

speaker: Robin
line: See you later, Miss Jade.

title: Step Description
content: The meeting with Oti Alfalfa surprised Topaz and Jade. They didn't expect him to be preparing for the public listing of Penacony Conglomerate.They have to go straight for Old Oti's sore spots during the second half of negotiations to guarantee the IPC's entry into Penacony goes off without a hitch.The second half of the meeting is about to begin. Jade is ready to hold nothing back as she launches her counterattack.

text: Start the second half of negotiations

speaker: Jade
line: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Alfalfa. Let's continue our discussion.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho, figured out something already, Miss Jade? Hmm... but where is Miss Topaz?

speaker: Jade
line: Topaz has something else to take care of, you'll be seeing her later. Talks can still continue between the two of us.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Is it just me, Miss? Your tone sounds... very different now.

speaker: Jade
line: I need to set a good example for my junior. It's not a good habit to be too loose-lipped during negotiations, right?

speaker: Jade
line: Now, we can speak frankly and openly. Do you believe what I said, Oti? You're not the only merchant who has seen the changes in the cosmic market over the past ten Amber Eras .

speaker: Old Oti
line: Interesting... Ohohoho, now that's interesting.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Good! It's good to be straightforward! Openness and transparency are my things! So, tell me, what's your next move?

speaker: Jade
line: Unfortunately, I'd like to speak the harsh truth before laying out my plan. Let's cut to the chase. First, your plan won't work. Penacony has no way of sidestepping the IPC and going public.

speaker: Jade
line: Second, you can't stop the IPC from entering Penacony. We've got all the time and connections in the world to find a way in. We'll keep tearing down and rebuilding this place until the Asdana system gets used to the IPC's ways again.

speaker: Jade
line: Now I'm repeating your words exactly. If you don't want to be a laughingstock and have everyone gunning for you at the official conference... you'd better drop your little pie-in-the-sky plan.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohohohoho! Interesting! Indeed!

speaker: Old Oti
line: You surely have a way with words! Now I'm curious to know what you have up your sleeve.

speaker: Jade
line: Mr. Alfalfa, let's not forget that the IPC controls the biggest interstellar publicity platform. More than half the news networks in the universe take their orders from us.

speaker: Jade
line: The moment news spreads about Penacony going public, trillions of customers will immediately receive a message like this:

speaker: Jade
line: "The Family's protection for Penacony has expired. Any mishaps in the Dreamscape could result in permanent brain death."

speaker: Jade
line: Care to guess how many ways we have to turn Alfalfa credits into worthless junk within a measly 24 system hours? With the entire cosmos keeping a close eye on Penacony, I assure you it won't be too hard.

speaker: Old Oti
line: You really think you can pull that off?

speaker: Jade
line: Even from Pier Point , as distant as it may be, I'm more than capable of keeping you on a tight leash.

speaker: Jade
line: However, if you agree to give up that half-baked plan to go public, the IPC will assure you that we'll never jeopardize the interests of the Family heads under your leadership.

speaker: Jade
line: After all, we also need allies here in Asdana. The IPC can assist Penacony with financing â€”starting by acquiring 30% equity shares. With our financial support, stabilizing and rebuilding Penacony will be a piece of cake.

speaker: Old Oti
line: 30% equity, you say? Who can guarantee you won't want more in the future?

speaker: Jade
line: Heh, that's the brilliant part of it all. The answer is simple: No one. There are no guarantees. It all hinges on self-awareness and mutual respect. However, the board of directors will consider the interests of the Family heads to some extent.

speaker: Jade
line: You're a smart merchant, Old Oti. Isn't the whole purpose of this elaborate game to showcase your business acumen and seek more benefits for The Family?

speaker: Jade
line: It benefits us if we both take a step back. And if that's not enough for you, I'm pretty sure that another goal of making Penacony go public is to expand the influence of the Planet of Festivities and attract more customers.

speaker: Jade
line: I understand your concern, and I have a solution for that, too.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Fine, now I see your sincerity. As the head of the Alfalfa Family , I don't think I have any reason to refuse your offer...

speaker: Old Oti
line: However, as THEIR chosen one, I still need one final answer.

speaker: Jade
line: Go ahead, I'm listening.

speaker: Old Oti
line: When I was a child, I heard the adults recite the tale of the Ancient Amber Era, about the ascension of Xipe the Harmony, and the downfall of Ena the Order .

speaker: Old Oti
line: The Order and the Preservation used to be close in ancient times. So why does the IPC, as a follower of the Amber Lord , seek collaboration with The Family instead of aligning with the Order?

speaker: Jade
line: The answer is simpler than you think: It's all about credits , everyone's favorite thing and the universally recognized currency among the stars. The IPC has the power to perpetually ensure their value.

speaker: Jade
line: With each new world integrated into the credit system, the IPC adds another building block to its cause. Eventually, all exchanges, capital, and businesses will operate within a unified monetary system.

speaker: Jade
line: By then, all planetary developments will be recorded in accounts with well-defined values and the ability for exchange and circulation. And the heart of everything will be Qlipoth 's "credit".

speaker: Old Oti
line: And then the IPC will be able to exert influence over everything.

speaker: Jade
line: Our intention is to establish enduring Preservation, so I'm sure you can understand...

speaker: Jade
line: This universe doesn't need two types of Order.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohoho! Well said! Now you've convinced me.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Alright, tell me your solution. Let's see if we're thinking the same thing.

speaker: Jade
line: Then let's continue our conversation. Please, Topaz, invite "Sweet Dew" to join us at the table.

speaker: Jade
line: Thank you for your presence, Miss Himeko.

speaker: Jade
line: Please allow me to introduce her to you, Mr. Alfalfa. This is Miss Himeko from the Astral Express, one of the future shareholders of Penacony!

speaker: Himeko
line: I've heard so much about you, Mr. Alfalfa. It's an honor to meet you as representative of the Astral Express.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohoho! This stunning lady is the navigator of the Astral Express? It's a pleasure to meet you.

speaker: Jade
line: I believe everyone here is familiar with the general contents of the proposal. After this round of financing, the IPC is expected to hold 30% of Penacony's shares.

speaker: Jade
line: Then, the IPC will transfer 5% of that stake to the Astral Express and recommend Miss Himeko as an independent director to honor the sacrifices and contributions made by the former Nameless to the Land of the Dreams.

speaker: Himeko
line: While this decision isn't finalized yet, we are honored that everyone here recognizes the way of the Trailblaze.

speaker: Himeko
line: While the Nameless didn't embark on their journeys for fame or fortune, if this is the wish of both The Family and the IPC, I will represent the Astral Express and fulfill my duty as a member of the board of directors.

speaker: Himeko
line: The entire Crew has agreed to assist in the reconstruction of Penacony. Beyond that, in our future travels, we are committed to bringing the beautiful dreams of the Planet of Festivities to more worlds.

speaker: Himeko
line: Of course, all cooperation is based on one premise...

speaker: Himeko
line: The Path of Harmony in Penacony must not be distorted again... and such a tragedy must never recur.

text: Get back to the hotel room and go over the meeting with Topaz

title: Step Description
content: With a little carrot and a little stick, Old Oti has to submit to Jade's conditions.Jade already knew the secrets of Penacony, and the introduction of the Astral Express into the negotiations is an extra insurance for the outcome.Now that the major issues have been discussed, Jade and Topaz have their own ideas about how to best enjoy their time aboard the Radiant Feldspar.

speaker: Topaz
line: Old Oti is in agreement, so the issue is settled, I presume. What about the remaining Family heads...?

speaker: Jade
line: They will soon realize the situation. When Old Oti answered the last question, he represented more than just the Alfalfa Family.

speaker: Topaz
line: When should we schedule the formal negotiations? I'll handle the arrangements.

speaker: Jade
line: It's all up to you. I'll step back and let you handle the negotiations and takeover. I won't be involved.

speaker: Topaz
line: But Miss Jade, this is...

speaker: Jade
line: Aventurine initiated this case, and you were his project partner. If that kid hadn't overplayed his hand, I wouldn't have been pushed to the forefront.

speaker: Jade
line: I came here today to help you sort out the toughest issue. I trust you'll be able to wrap things up quite nicely, little Jelena .

speaker: Topaz
line: Of course, there won't be any problems. And please, give Diamond my assurance.

speaker: Jade
line: Don't worry. Diamond has always trusted us. I'll put in a good word for you, and you'll have your P45 position back in no time.

speaker: Jade
line: Radiant Feldspar... what a fantastic ship. Now that my business is done, it's time for me to indulge in my own little hobby .

speaker: Topaz
line: You want to open a Bonajade Exchange branch on this ship, too?

speaker: Jade
line: Opportunities like this don't come around often. Just look at the guests on this ship. They're surely holding a wealth of valuable treasures.

speaker: Jade
line: Well, I'll take my leave. A pawnshop can't run without a boss. See you around, Topaz.

speaker: Topaz
line: I have one more question for you, Miss Jade.

speaker: Jade
line: Hmm? Go ahead.

speaker: Topaz
line: That dose of "bitter poison"... I'm curious as to how you found this information.

speaker: Jade
line: I didn't find the information. It came to me. It was from... a lady concerned with the future of the Harmony.

speaker: Jade
line: In return, I've agreed to help her with something, but that's for later. We can deal with it after we leave Penacony.

speaker: Jade
line: You see, that's what "investment" is all about. The seeds of opportunity are already sown, they only need a little bit of nourishment to take root. And then after, all we need to do is to wait patiently.

speaker: Jade
line: Like right now for example. It's just about time my final "guest" boarded the ship.

text: At this moment, a dexterous "stowaway" also boards the Radiant Feldspar...
